meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Echium with blue flowers.
meanings.sent1: The blueweeds in the garden added a pop of color.
meanings.sent2: I saw some beautiful blueweeds growing by the roadside.
meanings.sent3: The blueweeds seemed to be having a party with the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: The blueweeds stood out like a beacon among the greenery.
meanings.sent5: The blueweeds swayed gently in the breeze, mesmerizing all who passed by.

meanings.sent1: The blueweeds invaded the garden and spread quickly.
meanings.sent2: It's challenging to distinguish between blueweeds and other wildflowers.
meanings.sent3: The blueweeds played hide and seek among the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The blueweeds were like little bursts of sky scattered across the field.
meanings.sent5: The blueweeds stubbornly thrived in the neglected corner of the yard.
